mapper.select: SELECT id, dcls_month, fin_co_no, fin_prdt_cd, intr_rate_type, intr_rate_type_nm, rsrv_type, rsrv_type_nm, save_trm, intr_rate, intr_rate2 FROM savings_option ORDER BY fin_co_no, fin_prdt_cd, save_trm

SELECT id, dcls_month as dclsMonth, fin_co_no as finCoNo, fin_prdt_cd as finPrdtCd, intr_rate_type as intrRateType, intr_rate_type_nm as intrRateTypeNm, rsrv_type as rsrvType, rsrv_type_nm as rsrvTypeNm, save_trm as saveTrm, intr_rate as intrRate, intr_rate2 as intrRate2 FROM savings_option WHERE dcls_month = #{dclsMonth} AND fin_co_no = #{finCoNo} AND fin_prdt_cd = #{finPrdtCd} ORDER BY save_trm, intr_rate_type
